mapper.select: select id, code, name, content, raw_material, portion, taste, status, create_date, images, heat, protein, fat, user_id from dishes_info where 1 = 1 order by create_date desc

select di.id, di.code, di.name, di.content, di.raw_material, di.portion, di.taste, di.status, di.create_date, di.images, di.heat, di.protein, di.fat, di.user_id, ui.name as userName, ui.code as userCode, ui.images as userImages from dishes_info di left join user_info ui on (ui.id = di.user_id) where 1 = 1 and di.user_id != null order by create_date desc
